text:
🔔  Are you fact-checking #vaccine hoaxes? This is the LAST DAY to apply to the #VaccineGrantProgram. @WhatsApp and @factchecknet will distribute a half million dollars to projects that can scale up the fight against #pandemic rumors. 👉 https://t.co/Ytjdc88DYC
